title: I have a major idea which I think would be awesome for league!!
body: Much like having the Poro icons during the 'Legend of the Poro King' event to change your Poro's look, you could have different costumes on Jungle camps for icons, and when you go into the game it will change your teams Jungle camps to suit your icon. Or even if you kill that camp, and when it respawns it will have the costume on or something like that. Just a little idea I literally just thought of.

replies.body: i think thats an awesome idea
